section.p: For information on Open University courses and study packs write to

This text forms part of an Open University Third Level Course. If you would like a copy of Studying with The Open University, please write to the Course Enquiries Data Service, PO Box 625, Dane Road, Milton Keynes, MK1 1TY. If you have not already enrolled on the Course and would like to buy this or other Open University material, please write to Open University Educational Enterprises Ltd, 12 Cofferidge Close, Stony Stratford, Milton Keynes, MK11 1BY, United Kingdom.

section.lines: The Open University, Walton Hall, Milton Keynes, MK7 6AA
